div.p: Curia ballivorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxmo die octobris anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman balyeis Consal and communite of Abirdene
warnit be the hand bell throw the haill tone' and throw the premu
nicion' of the samyn forgathreit ande Circualie Inquerit be philp
Dunbrek officiar' be grantit to Sett to Alexander chamer of murchill
ane half nethis fischingis of the Raik and the landis of the gerron'
with thar pertinencis for' al the days of his lyve alanerlie but ayris and
assignez Ande that he sulde haue ane assedacion vndir thar' common'
Sell tharapon' and eftir his deces' the said demi nethis fischingis
and landis to be in the tovnis handis vacand ande frelie at thar'
disposicion but ony clame or Impediment of the saide Alexanderis
ayris ande assignez for the quhilkis the saide Alexander sal pay
tene markis to the tone or his letter of assedacion be selit
And' siclik girssome and malys as vthiris pais for siclik takis

The said day It was deliuerit ordanit ande decretit be the
aldirman ande Consale that ale personis within this burghe' havand'
takis of the tone sal pay thar' malys and fermis at the
termes vsuale within the burghe' and sal mak nay Impediment
nor stop tharto for ony clamys or dettis And alsua Alexander chamer
of murchill sal pay his malys restand vnpait this yer' bigan
to Alexander Rede Ande the balyeis of this yer' bigan sal pas' and
gathir' up the rest of the contribucion' avinge quhilkis was
grantit to the commissaris that passit for the defence of thar' heretage
and Inbring it betuix this and the next friday or ellis pundis or
defortis tharfor that the saide Alexander chamer and vthiris commmissaris that
wantis thar' part tharof may be pait or ellis the saide balyeis
to pay it one thar' awne purs' and Alexander menyes' to pay
to William lutar' xxtj s' restand' of his maile

the saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit to Johnhe lammynton'
the law day next eftir pasche to preyf Adam brovnis obliga
cion' pait

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiiij
die octobris anno quo supra

Eodem die Andreas murray legittime vocatus responsurus plegio super ipsum
pro Dauid menyeis porrecto pro iniusta postposicione et recusacione iiijxx
li' pro redempcione piscarie dimidij rethis de furdis et cetera non comparuit
Igitur precipitur philippo Dunbrek sergeando capere districtum a dicto Andrea
et eundem ad plegium dimitti si petatur et ipsum Andream hodie ad quindenam
premunire ad respondendum dicto plegio tanquam 3o die huius processus

Eodem die philippus Dunbrek seriandus de mandato prepositi et ballivorum
premunivit et onerauit Elizibeth' Waus relictam Dauid prat persolut'
in Curia ad comparendum hodie ad octo ad respondendum thome prat
penes terras et bona Dauid prat filij sui et cetera Et huiusmodi actio continuatur
vsque in hunc diem sub Spe concordie cum consensu parcium

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvij die
Octobris anno quo supra

The saide day Robert pipar grantit him borghe' to Jonhne andirson'
for viij s' for dene Androw pyotis

The saide day It was Statut' and ordanit be the aldirman and balyeis
ande Consale that thomas meldrum and Androw michelsone sal vs'
consider and se with ale diligence ale work pertening to thar' craft
within this burghe Ande present ale vnsufficient werk to the aldirman
and balyeis that it is may be pvnist as law wile Ande gif
thai do nocht thai salbe pvnist for ale the the evile Stuff maid'
within the tone be the aldirman and consale

The saide day Johne Wormet grantit to releywe marione
balcromy of xvj s' of annuell aucht to William blinsel of
the lande of vmquhile moir' als'lange as he breukis the
saide lande

add.note: The first 'the myllis' is written in the margin just above the entry, the second at the bottom of the entry.

div.p:
The saide day the aldirman balyeis and consal grant and Set the
nethir myll with the pertinencis to William buchane baxtar for the termes of
xv yeris his Entray in and with the samyn at Witsonday precedent
the date of this ak to be Josit be him and his assignez' nay gretar
thane him Self Induellaris of Abirdene he and thai bigand and vphaldin
the saide myll deuly and Soueralie as efferis and lewand hir' welbigit
in ale thingis as efferis be the sicht of the aldirman and consal the
saide William and his assignais payand' yerlie Ilkan yer' tene markis
of vsuale money of Scotland of maile at thir termes that is to say
fiwe markis at martimes in winter next and immediate aftir follouing the
date of this ak and vthir fiwe merkis at Witsonday next and immediate
thareftir follouing and safurtht termlie And ordanis ane assedacion
to be maid' to him herapone vndir the commone Seile quhilkis
tene markis salbe pait yerlie and termlie to the common clerk of
said' burghe excerceand' that office

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Antepenvltimo
die mensis octobris Anno quo supra

Eodem die thomas philp amerciatur pro perturbio Duncanj portar et Idem
Duncanus amerciatur pro perturbio dicti thome per assisam ex omni thome prat
prelocutorem assise et quilibet emendabit ut iura volunt Et dicte
partes fide media se obligarunt ad standandum ordinacionem dicte assise
pro huiusmodi perturbio que mature auisiata deliberarunt et ordinarunt
quemlibet ipsorum vnam li' cere ad lumen Sancti sanguinis refundere
et si deinceps conuicti fuerint aut aliquis ipsorum Soluet xl s'
fabrice ecclesie sine remissione

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo
die Octobris anno quo supra

the saide day the balyeis assignit this day viij dais to Wilyeam
Yonge to ansuer' to Ebe gray anent the takin of hir' wisteale
and ale clamys debatabile betuix thame but ony langar'
delay or' excepcion'

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday that next
cumis to thomas prat one that ane part Ande the Relict of vmquhile
Dauid prat one that vthir part to comper befor thame and ansuer' Ilkane
tile vthiris but ony dilatouris anent the tutory of Dauid prat sone
and ayr to the saide Dauid And his ayrschip and gudis Ande anent al debatis
and clamys debatabile betuix thame bringand with thame ale
that' richtis writis and documentis quhilkis thai wile vys' as day of
peremptour'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem 3o die
mensis nouembris Anno quo supra

The saide day it was fundin and deliuerit be the aldirman ande
Consale that thomas prat is tutor' to Dauid prat his emys
Sone maid' and creat be vmquhile Dauid prat his fadir be
virtew of ane Instrument producit befor thame vndir the hande and
Signe of sere William muresone notar and Curat of Abirdene
tharfor thai fande and deliuerit that the saide thomas has resone to haf
the said childe his gudis of Arschipe and landis In his gouernance Ande ordanit
Elizibeth Waus his modir to deliuer and gif the saide child'
his gudis and landis to the saide thomas pertening to him of
ayrschipe be deces' of his saide fadir

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vijo die mensis nouembris
Anno quo supra

Eodem die Andreas murray senior legitime vocatus ad respondendum plegio
alias per Dauid menyes porrecto pro piscaria dimidij rethis de furthis g'
comparuit set respondere recusauit Igitur precipitur' philippo Dunbrek
seriando ad capiendum districtum a dicto Andrea et eundem ad plegium dimitti
sed petatur' et eundem Andream premunire hodie ad quindenam ad respondendum dicto
plegio tanquam quarto die huius processus

The saide day fransy Culane procurator to William philp In that parte follouit'
Jonhne thomsone for the wranguis' haldin fra him of ane hat price vj s'
and viij d' and for demi ane eln' of braide clath and iij d' of Siluer quhilkis
the said Johne denyit and with bath thar' consentis the saide action' was put
to the decision' of ane assis' quhilkis riplie avisit the gret aithe suorne
fand' and deliuerit be the moutht of Jonhne Waus in the greyne forspekar
of the saide Assis' the the saide Jonhne thomsone quyt of the said hat
clath and Siluer et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxj die nouembris
anno quo supra per Jacobum Colisone vnum balliuorum eiusdem et cetera

The saide day Dauid menyes presentit to the saide balye ane' letter of our Soueran
lordis vndir the priue Sele quhilkis follouis James be the grace of god
Kinge of Scottis to the balyeis of our burghe of Abirdene greting forsamekile as
It is menit and schevin to vs be our louet familiar' seruitouris and custummar' Dauid
menyes' that he has ane action' dependinge befor you movit be him be ane
borghe agane Androw murray anent ane half neth' of the furdis quhilkis is processit
to the ferd courte Our wile is herfor and we charge you stratlie and commandis
that ye In continent thir our' lettres seyne procede in the saide matir the said ferde
court And tak the saide Dauidis preyffis tharintile and do Justice to him
In the said matir but delay accordinge to the lavis of our realme As ye
Wile ansuer to vs apone the execucion of your office And vndir
ale payne and charge that eftir may follou deliueringe thir our lettres be you
deuly execut and Indorsat agane to the berar' gevin vndir our priue Sele
at Abirdene the x day of nouembir and of our Regne the vij yer' quhilkis
letter beand herd seyne and vndirstandin the saide Dauid askit ande
requerit the said balye to minister Justice to him in the saide action' accord
ding to the tenour of our Soueran lordis lettres be virteu of his office and the
saide balye with avis' of the consale the said Dauid beand' remouit causit
philp Dunbrek officiar' and mastir Jonhne badenaghe' notar with thre famous'
personis and witnes Alexander gray Duncan talyour and James Crage pas' to the Innes
and hous' of Androw murray and warne him to cum and ansuer' to the borghe
strekit one him be the said Dauid as the ferd day of proces' nocht withstandinge
he was lauchfullie warnit tharto obefor And the saide officiar' befor
the notar and witnes forsaid passit and warnit him at his saide hous' to
the saide day to ansuer to the said borghe' as law wile quhilkis war
Sufficientlie preuit in the said courtis And thareftir the said Dauid askit and requerit the
saide Androw to be lauchfullie callit to ansuer to the said borghe as the
ferd day of proces' quhilkis oftymes Callit and nocht comperit the saide Dauide
fand ane borghe' in the hand of the said philp Dunbrek officiar' that he
herd recouerit his clame apone the saide Androw that he wranguislie
postponis deferris and refusis the resate of lxxx li' vsual money of
Scotlande for the redempcion of demi nethis fischingis of the furdis for null
defens' and askit ward and dome Ande the said Dauid beinge removit
and the saide Androw nor nayne vthiris present for him Apon the quhilkis
borghe the court riplie avisit the processis herd and vndirstandin wardit
be thir personis vndir writin that is to Say Alexander chamer of murchill Robert
blinsell Alexander Rede Jonhne Colisone Johne Wormet thomas prat William
blinsell Alexander gray thomas mar' patrik leslie William gray Duncan smyth
Richard Waus' thomas Symsone William Colp Johne Waus' in futy
Dauid talyouris mark Scot henry rede and henry bavne And gif for
dome be the moutht of Jonhne Williamson dempstar of the said courte that the said' borghe
Strekit be the said Dauid is of vaile for null defense And the
said' Androw in ane Amerciament of the court et cetera sic as he aw to tyne of law
et cetera

the saide day Dauid patersone seruand to henry bavne conuikit
be ane Suorne assis' Alexander chamer forspekar for the wranguis'
Strubulance of Sandy talyouris vndir cilence of the nichtis et cetera
the said Dauid conuikit be ane assis' the saide Alexander forspekar
for the strubulance of seruand to Sandy Wilsone
vndir Cilence of the nycht et cetera and to Amend to the saide partes as
law wile et cetera

Eodem die henricus bavne amerciatur per assisam ex ore Alexandri chamer prelocutoris
assise pro perturbio Alexandri talyour' et familifamuli Alexandri Wilson'
sub Cilencio noctis quibus emendabit ut Jura volunt Et
Soluet x s' fabrice ecclesie Abirdonensis Et si In postrum tales iniurias
facere contigerit et Inde conuictus fuerit Secludendus est de burgo
et dictus Alexander et conuicti de omni perturbio

The saide day Jonhne ramsay grantit him avand to thome Symsone
x s' to be pait be yule next hereftir follouing And atour he and his wif
one that ane part and the said thomas one that vthir part was oblist and
Suorne to stand at the ordinance of the four' personis chosin
betuix tham obefor and Ilkan to caus' the persons chosin be tham cum
and giffertht thar' deliuerance herintill of the debatis betuix tham

The saide day ale the baxtaris except' Williame of buchane was
conuikit for brekin of pace for bakin of evile stuff and for
evile bakin breide

Eodem die Johannes andirsone solutus fuit de viij s' per Robertum
pipar' content' in quodam acto precedente
